flow.descriptionCdata:
4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.16a396c2-5ad5-4178-9e34-21f9fbda3b06.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.16db07b2-dec1-43e5-ab2e-c714f6475f9a.prompt=Process Instance ID 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.2912364c-4303-484a-93b8-eac9a4bcfb46.prompt=Artifact ID 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.3226766e-ca9a-41ea-b7a7-989e0f932c9f.prompt=Process Instance ID 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.47844e53-fc73-4eb6-9de1-0feea5998b80.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.51a3ba3c-c143-4f3f-8b8a-afebee1c0460.prompt=Resource Provider ID 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.5704ded0-4454-45bf-8d6f-b56d66c26449.prompt=User Identifier 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.595acb06-acaa-407c-85e0-90e17d3e8137.prompt=User Identifier 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.76d9fc6c-effc-490e-b2a2-a63f299b5f2e.prompt=User Identifier 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.903411a7-0fda-4f8a-b160-965bb6bffd0f.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.a8afb88f-c3ad-416d-b770-28011091501d.prompt=User Identifier 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.c030773a-46c8-48da-bd7e-ec5cd8b5e678.prompt=User Identifier 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.description=
Un Deploy the cloned Server from vCenter.

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.e5a882e8-d740-4cac-a262-956c2320eae8.prompt=Process Instance ID 4f5b74f5-848b-4749-aa83-856ac6f0564e.e831e202-e3b4-4be1-aacf-8665a5c5bcda.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute Linux - Undeploy
